Package BillboardViewer

Class Billboard

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
BillboardViewer.Billboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Billboard
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable
Creates a billboard object that contains the values for the desired billboard. Can be run to create a fullscreen borderless view of the billboard. Has a public function that returns a panel - createBillboardPanel, that creates a panel to be used within a JFrame object Has a public function that allows it to display a fullscreen preview - createBillboardDisplay, for a preview If a value is null or an empty string, the billboard assumes those portions do not exist. All colours are hexadecimal strings that are decoded within, for easy of use when receiving values from a string
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • resizeText

      private java.awt.Font resizeText​(double boxWidth, double boxHeight, java.lang.String text, boolean title, int maxSize)
      Resizes the text to fit the size of the billboard.
      Parameters:
      boxWidth - The width of the text box.
      boxHeight - The height of the text box.
      text - The text to be resized.
      title - A bool that determines whther it resizes to one line or multiple.
      maxSize - The maximum font size.
      Returns:
      The maximum font size that would fit the text in the text box.

    • imageRescale

      private java.awt.Dimension imageRescale​(int originalWidth, int originalHeight, int boundWidth, int boundHeight)
      Rescales the image to the correct size for the particular layout of the billboard.
      Parameters:
      originalWidth - Original image width.
      originalHeight - Original image height.
      boundWidth - The maximum width of the resized image.
      boundHeight - The maximum height of the resized image.
      Returns:
      The biggest image that will fit in the borders.

    • createBillboardPanel

      public javax.swing.JPanel createBillboardPanel​(java.awt.Dimension billboardSize)
      Creates a panel for use in a JFrame that will have the entire billboard inside of it.
      Parameters:
      billboardSize - A dimension object that has the desired size of the billboard.
      Returns:
      A JPanel object with the billboard sized to fit.
